name: Harry Headman's Day Off
description:
An absurd parody game with a city to explore and more!

This game is a work in progress.

Controls:
WASD to move

E to interact/pickup weapons/advance dialogue box

R to reload

Left click to fire

Enter to immediately close dialogue box

Programming by: Austin Puma

Level Design by: Ben Sacher

Art and Models by: Charles Rothrock
